issues.title: Errors when interacting with roles - database postgreSQL
issues.description: Errors when interacting with roles - database postgreSQL. Continuously getting something went wrong errors in the UI when interacting with different flows under ROles such as View permissions of the Administrator role

issues.title: Empty second step when there are no secondary userstore created on the wizard
issues.description: Navigate to attributes section and click on New attribute and enter an attribute name follow to next step. And you will get the above blank screen as the second step. This confuses user on what has missed or why it's not loaded.
